WorkItem.Description:
I noticed that with my enhancement shammy (I haven't checked other toons), that on the Stats tab --> under Complex Stats -> Avoided Attacks.
 
Avoided Attacks: 4.91
 
However the tooltip shows the breakdown as:
 
0.13% Boss Dodged
0.00% Boss Parried
0.00% Spell Misses
5.05% White Misses
 
My guess is that it's deducting the Boss Dodged value from the White Misses but I would have been expecting it to have been added together. So instead of 4.91% I would have expected it to be 5.18%, or have I missed something?

Comments.Message: without looking at it myself right now, does it say 4.91% or 4.91 attacks (meaning an average of 4.91 out of all your attacks are avoided?)

Please when posting an issue take the time to post your XML file. Otherwise we cannot see the issue. If I cannot see the issue I cannot fix the issue.

I suspect its to do with the recent crit cap fixes.

Sorry, attaching the file now.

It says 4.91% of attacks (not 4.91 of attacks).

I'm not sure what version you added the crit cap changes into, but I just went back to version 2.3.0 with an old xml file and it still shows the same issue.  (also swapped an expertise gem to AP to show the issue).  It showed it as:

Avoided Attacks:   1.53%

Tooltip shows:

0.13% Boss Dodged
0.00% Boss Parried
0.00% Spell Misses
1.66% White Misses
